briefTitle: An Open-label Extension Study to Assess the Long-term Safety and Efficacy of ISIS 301012 (Mipomersen) in Patients With Familial Hypercholesterolemia or Severe-Hypercholesterolemia
officialTitle: An Open-label Extension Study to Assess the Long-term Safety and Efficacy of ISIS 301012 in Patients With Familial Hypercholesterolemia or Severe-Hypercholesterolemia
summary: To evaluate the safety and efficacy of extended dosing with mipomersen (ISIS 301012) in participants with familial hypercholesterolemia or severe hypercholesterolemia on lipid-lowering therapy who had completed either the 301012-CS5 (NCT00607373), 301012-CS7 (NCT00706849), 301012-CS17 (NCT00477594) or MIPO3500108 (NCT00794664) clinical drug trials.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Low Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (LDL-C)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline up to Week 234; 24 weeks post treatment (up to 4.5 years)
